revised_title: Immunologically Similar Protein Produced by Baby Hamster Kidney Cells
tldr: The article discusses the discovery of a protein, immunologically similar to Tamm-Horsfall glycoprotein, produced by cultured baby hamster kidney cells. The protein was isolated from the medium in which the kidney cells were cultured and shared similarities with hamster urinary Tamm-Horsfall glycoprotein in terms of composition and probable molecular size. Further study is required to understand the relation between these glycoproteins.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
